title: 服务器无故崩溃
author: Marston
txt_content:

2020-02-08-1.log

replies.author: 粘兽
replies.txt_content:
Marston 发表于 2020-2-8 19:33
怎么删除开启功能= =
修改config/forge.cfg中的两项
B:removeErroringEntities=true
B:removeErroringTileEntities=true复制代码

replies.author: 傲世九重天
replies.txt_content: 可以发下mod列表和插件列表么 还有服务器是什么版本的发来看下

replies.author: 粘兽
replies.txt_content:
是ic2的报错导致的崩溃
删除或开启forge的清除异常实体功能试试
